``` ::: column-screen ::: hero-banner ::: content-block # 2024 Annual Conference of the American Psychology-Law Society ### Los Angeles, California \| March 21-23, 2024 ::: hero-buttons [Register Now](https://apls.memberclicks.net/24conferencereg#!/){#btn-guide .btn-action .btn-action .btn .btn-success role="button"} [Learn More](#register){.btn-action .btn .btn-secondary role="button"} ::: ::: ::: ::: ::: simple-info ::: {.content-block .col-v-center} ## Get Ready for APLS 2024! ::: ::: grid ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .col-v-center} The 2024 APLS Conference will be held at The Westin Bonaventure Hotel and Suites in Los Angeles, California from March 21-23. [Add to Calender](https://www.addevent.com/event/My18398113){.btn-action-primary .btn-action .btn .btn-primary role="button"} ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .col-v-center} ![](images/2024_announcement.png){width="300"} ::: ::: ::: ::: column-screen ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: ::: # General Information {#info} ::: {.panel-tabset .box-shadow} ## {{< fa calendar >}} Important Dates ### Important Dates **Early bird-registration ends**: January 31, 2024 **Hotel group-rate ends**: February 25, 2024 ## {{< fa person-running >}} Fun Run ::: simple-info ##### Explore Los Angeles with colleagues on a 5k Fun Run, sponsored by the AP-LS Student Committee! ### Friday, March 22, 2024 ::: {.callout-note appearance="simple"} #### **MEET IN LOBBY OF THE CONFERENCE HOTEL AT 7:00 AM** REFRESHMENTS WILL BE PROVIDED AFTER THE RACE [COST: TBD]{.badge .bg-warning} ***Funds raised are used to support student committee conference awards*** ::: ::: ## {{< fa handshake-angle title="Volunteer" >}} Student Volunteers Students are eligible to receive complimentary conference registration by volunteering to serve as staff during the annual conference. **To apply:** 1. Submit a letter of intent to serve on official letterhead from your program chair, department head, or faculty to {{< fa envelope title="Email" >}} {{< var email.office >}} that includes the following statement: | *"This letter of intent is made with the full understanding that \[insert student name here\] will volunteer as staff support for the AP-LS 2024 conference for which the registration scholarship has been awarded. Failure to serve will not only void the scholarship but will jeopardize future requests. Should I attend the conference and fail to serve, payment in full of applicable fees will be rendered to AP-LS upon request."* 2. All Submissions are due **November 24th, 2023** and will be reviewed and accepted by **November 30th**. If you are accepted you will receive a discount code for registration. We highly recommend waiting to register until receiving this discount code as refunds can often take some time. ## {{< fa circle-info >}} For Presenters ### Symposia, Paper, and Data Blitz Sessions **Symposium sessions** are 80 minutes long. Allow approximately 10 minutes for questions and comments from the audience. Divide the remaining time evenly between the presenters and the discussant. **Paper sessions** are 60 minutes long. Most sessions have four or five papers; therefore, each presenter should plan to have 10-12 minutes to present. This will allow time at the end for audience questions. A chair will be assigned to paper sessions and will make introductions, help keep time, as well as guide questions at the end of the session. **Data-Blitz sessions** are 60 minutes long. Data-blitz presenters have a maximum of 5 minutes each (3-5 slides), followed by approximately 10 minutes of questions from the audience at the end of the session. ::: {.callout-caution} All presentation rooms will be set up with a computer, screen, and projector. **Bring a flash drive** to download the presentation onto the computer, and do not count on the availability of the **internet** in presentation rooms. ::: ### Poster Sessions Poster sessions are scheduled from 6:30-8:00 pm on Friday and Saturday evenings. Presenters are scheduled for either Friday or Saturday night and will be given a number to correspond with the board where they should display their posters. **Poster Sizing:** The boards for mounting a poster are 4 ft (height) x 8 ft (width). Presenters are free to create any size poster that will fit within that space. Presenters will need to bring push pins to hang their posters; we do not provide push pins. ::: {.callout-tip} We encourage poster presenters to use a [Better Poster format](https://convention.apa.org/blog/rethinking-the-science-poster). ::: ## {{< fa circle-user >}} Conference Organizers #### Conference Co-Chairs Caitlin Cavanagh, Ph.D.
Samantha Zottola, Ph.D. #### Questions? If you have any other questions, please contact: {{< fa envelope title="Email" >}} {{< var email.conference >}}
{{< fa envelope title="Email" >}} {{< var email.office >}} :::
::: vspace ::: ::: column-screen ::: {.simple-info-blue .alt-background-blue} ::: content-block-blue ### The 2024 APLS Annual Conference DRAFT Program is now available! [View Program {{< fa arrow-right >}}](https://drive.google.com/file/d/11XKPQH2qxnAYYbv0X5vNr1I2FfTPvf9e/view?usp=sharing){.btn-action .btn .btn-secondary .btn-lg role="button"} ::: ::: ::: ::: vspace ::: ::: {simple-info} # Hotel Information {#hotel} ::: {.panel-tabset .box-shadow} ## {{< fa hotel >}} The Westin Bonaventure Hotel and Suites ![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/3/3a/Westin_Bonaventure_Hotel.jpg){fig-align="center" height="300"} > The 2024 AP-LS Conference will be held at the [The Westin Bonaventure Hotel and Suites](https://www.marriott.com/en-us/hotels/laxbw-the-westin-bonaventure-hotel-and-suites-los-angeles/overview/) ### Conference Rates AP-LS has rooms set aside for all attendees, which can be booked at a special group rate that is available for attendees: {{< fa credit-card >}} Group Rate \$249
{{< fa calendar >}} Available March 19 - March 24
{{< fa square-parking >}} Discounted Valet Parking (\$38/ night) Attendees must book their room by **February 25th, 2024** to take advantage of the special rate! ::: hero-buttons [{{< fa bell-concierge >}} Book a Room](https://www.marriott.com/event-reservations/reservation-link.mi?id=1698166662825&key=GRP&app=resvlink){.btn-action .btn .btn-info .ml-auto role="button"} [{{< fa hotel >}} Website](https://goo.gl/maps/p6PCdg1nZ46NASuw9){.btn-action .btn .btn-dark .ml-auto role="button"} ::: ## {{< fa plane >}} Plan your trip For attendees flying in to Los Angeles, the LAX FlyAway runs from LAX to the Union Station train station in downtown LA and is \$10. The LAX FlyAway runs from LAX every 30 minutes and from Union Station every hour. Union Station is a short Uber or cab ride to the hotel but is a great option for individuals arriving alone as Ubers and cabs directly from the airport can be costly. ::: hero-buttons [{{< fa map-location-dot >}} Get Directions](https://goo.gl/maps/p6PCdg1nZ46NASuw9){.btn-action .btn .btn-info .ml-auto role="button"} ::: ::: :::
::: vspace ::: # Registration {#register} ::: {.simple-info} ::: {.panel-tabset .box-shadow} ## {{< fa bullhorn >}} Info ##### Registration is now open! ::: vspace ::: We encourage you to register before **January 31st** to take advantage of the early bird pricing! ::: vspace ::: [Register Now {{< fa arrow-right >}}](https://apls.memberclicks.net/24conferencereg#!/){.btn-action .btn .btn-primary .btn-lg role="button"} ## {{< fa circle-info >}} Pricing ::: {.callout-note appearance="simple"} ## REGISTRATION RATES & INCLUSIONS \*Rates may be subject to change +-----------------------------------------+-----------------+------------+-----------+ | Status | Early Bird\ | Regular\ | | | | (before Jan 31) | (on Feb 1) | | +:========================================+:================+:===========+===========+ | Full Member | \$285 | \$315 | | +-----------------------------------------+-----------------+------------+-----------+ | Early Career Professional Member | \$205 | \$235 | | +-----------------------------------------+-----------------+------------+-----------+ | Student Member | \$80 | \$110 | | +-----------------------------------------+-----------------+------------+-----------+ | Student Member *First-Author Presenter* | \$40 | \$40 | | +-----------------------------------------+-----------------+------------+-----------+ | Student Non-member | \$140 | \$170 | | +-----------------------------------------+-----------------+------------+-----------+ | Non-member | \$400 | \$470 | | +-----------------------------------------+-----------------+------------+-----------+ ::: ::: :::
::: vspace ::: # Preconference Workshops {#preconference} ::: simple-info ::: {.panel-tabset .box-shadow} ## {{< fa bullhorn >}} Info At this year's conference we are excited to offer [**two**]{.underline} full day workshops and [**four**]{.underline} half day workshops on that will take place on **Wednesday March 20**. Attendees will have the ability to register for the pre conference workshops with their conference registration. [Learn More {{< fa arrow-right >}}](preconference/index.qmd){.btn-action .btn .btn-primary .btn-lg role="button"} ## {{< fa circle-info >}} Pricing ::: {.callout-note appearance="simple"} ## REGISTRATION RATES & INCLUSIONS \*Pricing is subject to change ### Full-Day Workshop Rates +--------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | Status | Early Bird\ | Regular\ | | | (before Jan 31) | (on Feb 1) | +:===================+:================+:===============+ | Member | \$200 | \$230 | +--------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | Non-Member | \$250 | \$280 | +--------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | Student Member | \$80 | \$100 | +--------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | Student Non-member | \$100 | \$120 | +--------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | | | | +--------------------+-----------------+----------------+ ### Half-Day Workshop Rates +--------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | Status | Early Bird\ | Regular\ | | | (before Jan 31) | (on Feb 1) | +:===================+:================+:===============+ | Member | \$100 | \$115 | +--------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | Non-Member | \$125 | \$140 | +--------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | Student Member | \$40 | \$50 | +--------------------+-----------------+----------------+ | Student Non-member | \$50 | \$60 | +--------------------+-----------------+----------------+ ::: ::: :::
::: vspace ::: # Exhibitors & Sponsors {#sponsors} ::: {.simple-info} ::: {.panel-tabset .box-shadow} ## {{< fa bullhorn >}} Info Signing up as a Business Partner of AP-LS has never been easier. Select your sponsorship, upload your logo, register your staff and make a payment all in one place. [Become Sponsor {{< fa arrow-right >}}](https://apls.memberclicks.net/Sponsor24#!/){.btn-action .btn .btn-primary .btn-lg role="button"} ## {{< fa file-pdf >}} Exhibitor Prospectus
Download
::: vspace ::: ```{=html} ``` ::: :::
